name: Santas Unwanted Helper: Reindeer Revolution
description:
Santa Claus has been hit by an asteroid! Now the christmas gifts are scattered all over the woods and the reindeers have had enough.
• Collect the gifts and bring them to Santa Claus before the time runs out
• Avoid the evil reindeers and dangerous traps
• Eat candy for temporary boosts
• Prove your skills on the online leaderboards
Game made with C# MonoGame. Artwork by JohnStapler. Music by Pant0don @ opengameart.
